title: Stage Lv10-S28
description: Level 10 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Things seem to have gotten a bit awkward between us.
I think it's better to keep some distance from that person.
learning_points: Level 10 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 우리 사이가 좀 어색해진 것 같아.
sentences.en: Things seem to have gotten a bit awkward between us.

sentences.kr: 그 사람하고는 좀 거리를 두는 게 좋을 것 같아.
sentences.en: I think it's better to keep some distance from that person.
I feel like we're connecting on some level.

sentences.kr: 서로 조금씩 맞춰가는 중인 것 같아.
sentences.en: I think we're gradually adjusting to each other.

sentences.kr: 좀 더 가까워진 것 같아. 기분 좋네.
sentences.en: We seem to have gotten closer. That feels good.
I think we're still a bit distant with each other.

sentences.kr: 그 사람 기분을 좀 상하게 한 것 같아.
sentences.en: I think I might have hurt that person's feelings a bit.
We're comfortable with each other, aren't we? Be honest with me.
